publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3546 Mr Charlie Gordon: Carers’ Rights Day 2005—That the Parliament acknowledges the dedication and commitment of Scotland’s carers; notes Carers’ Rights Day on Friday 2 December 2005; congratulates carers’ groups, such as the Glasgow South East Carers Network which is a great source of guidance and advice to carers of all ages in the south east of Glasgow, and supports the aim of this year’s theme of raising awareness of applicable benefits to carers over 60.

S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Richard Baker*, Janis Hughes*, Bill Butler*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Brian Adam*, Tricia Marwick*, Eleanor Scott*, Jackie Baillie*, Patrick Harvie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bruce Crawford*, Des McNulty*, Michael McMahon*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Sarah Boyack*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Colin Fox*

S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Scott Barrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Maureen Macmillan*, Cathie Craigie*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3546 Mr Charlie Gordon: Carers’ Rights Day 2005—That the Parliament acknowledges the dedication and commitment of Scotland’s carers; notes Carers’ Rights Day on Friday 2 December 2005; congratulates carers’ groups, such as the Glasgow South East Carers Network which is a great source of guidance and advice to carers of all ages in the south east of Glasgow, and supports the aim of this year’s theme of raising awareness of applicable benefits to carers over 60. Supported by: Richard Baker, Janis Hughes, Bill Butler, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Brian Adam, Tricia Marwick, Eleanor Scott, Jackie Baillie, Patrick Harvie, Margaret Jamieson, Bruce Crawford, Des McNulty, Michael McMahon, Karen Gillon, Mr Bruce McFee, Sarah Boyack, Dr Elaine Murray, Marlyn Glen, Colin Fox, Scott Barrie, Roseanna Cunningham, Trish Godman, Tommy Sheridan, Marilyn Livingstone, Maureen Macmillan, Cathie Craigie, Donald Gorrie, Mr Brian Monteith*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, John Swinburne*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) John Home Robertson*
S2M-3546 Carers’ Rights Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Susan Deacon*
